title: Decadent Pecan Pie
ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten', '200g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons melted butter', '175g golden syrup', '125ml double cream', '125ml brandy', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons chopped pecans', '1 (23cm) unbaked shortcrust pastry case', '110g pecan halves']
